text: Hi <@U39DT5YFL>,  sorry for delayed response, you are using module id in repeater and module definitely has only one ID which is being repeated. You can concatenate loop index to make it unique.

I'm not adding the ID myself though. It's added automatically from the field snippet. So there's no way to concatenate a loop index to it or get rid of it. It's causing errors in HTML validation and ADA compliance tests so I want the IDs either gone or made unique.
Iâ€™m struggling to find any docs on the `visibility`  option for showing and hiding fields. Anyone know where I could find that?
Check the display conditions help popup on a field. Basically the field will be hidden until the condition is met.
I had this problem too and wrote my own post: <https://www.stephanieogaygarcia.com/HubSpot-website-development/set-a-HubSpot-module-fields-display-conditions-in-local-development>
But then I also found this on the boilerplate readme: <https://github.com/HubSpot/cms-theme-boilerplate/tree/master/src>
I think <@U7SL518D6> said it would be added to documentation soon anyway
Yes, it will be added soon. Great post Stephanie!

Is it possible to access the "video embed" files with the file chooser in custom modules?

We have a client that wants to use HubSpot video and there's no way to embed from a custom module
